units.title: Isolate colonic crypts
units.text: Crypts of the healthy portion of the colonic epithelium (at least 10 cm away from the tumor side) were isolated by digestion of the intestinal mucosa in chelation solution (5.6 mM Na2HPO4, 8.0 mM KH2PO4, 96.2 mM NaCl, 1.6 mM KCl, 43.4 mM Sucrose, and 54.9 mM D-Sorbitol, Sigma) supplemented with dithiotreitol (0.5 mM, Sigma) and EDTA (2 mM, in-house) for 30 min at 4 °C.
units.rationale: This is a clear, actionable step describing the isolation procedure of colonic crypts using specific reagents and conditions.

units.title: Plate crypts in basement membrane extract
units.text: Colonic crypts were subsequently plated in basement membrane extract (BME; Cultrex PC BME RGF type 2, Amsbio).
units.rationale: This step details the plating of isolated crypts in a defined extracellular matrix, a critical protocol action for organoid formation.

units.title: Culture organoids in human intestinal stem cell medium
units.text: Organoids were grown in human intestinal stem cell medium (HISCM), which is composed of Advanced Dulbecco’s modified Eagle medium/F12 supplemented with penicillin/streptomycin, 10 mM HEPES and Glutamax (all Gibco, Thermo Fischer Scientific) with 50% Wnt3a conditioned medium (in-house), 20% R-Spondin1 conditioned medium (in-house), 10% Noggin conditioned medium (in-house), 1x B27, 1.25mM N-acetyl cysteine, 10 mM nicotinamide, 50 ng/ml human EGF, 10 nM Gastrin, 500 nM A83-01, 3 µM SB202190, 10 nM prostaglandine E2 and 100 µg/ml Primocin (Invivogen).
units.rationale: This provides a detailed, actionable protocol for culturing organoids with exact medium components and concentrations.

units.title: Dissociate tumor biopsies into single cells
units.text: Tumor biopsies were digested into single cells using collagenase II (1 mg/ml, Gibco, Thermo Fischer Scientific), supplemented with hyaluronidase (10 µg/ml) and LY27632 (10 µM) for 30 min at 37 °C while shaking.
units.rationale: This is a precise, step-by-step procedure for dissociating tumor tissue into single cells using specific enzymes and conditions.

units.title: Plate dissociated tumor cells in BME with modified medium
units.text: Dissociated tumor cells were plated in BME and organoids were cultured in HICS minus Wnt conditioned medium and supplemented with 10 µM LY27632 at 37 °C.
units.rationale: This describes a specific culture protocol for tumor-derived organoids with defined medium modifications and temperature.
